LogPath.description: Path where log files are written.

DropPath.description: List of directories where files are dropped.

HostedSources.description: directories where any process may store files persistently. when file changes are detected, after the IdleTimeout elapsed, a snapshots of the directory is taken

IdleTimeout.description: Idle timeout duration in HH:MM:SS format.

BackupsetAssemblyPath.description: Path where backup sets are assembled.

BackupsetStorePath.description: Path where backup sets are stored.

TickInterval.description: how often changes are evaluated, in HH:MM:SS format.

LogfileRetentionDuration.description: Retention duration for log files in DD:HH:MM:SS format.

BackupSetFinishedCommand.description: Command to execute when a backupset has been completed.

DropFileWriteTimeout.description: Timeout for writing drop files in HH:MM:SS format.

BackupsetAssemblyTimeout.description: Timeout for backup set assembly in HH:MM:SS format.
